headline: IPG Q1 Earnings Call: Revenue Meets Expectations as Restructuring and Client Losses Weigh on Results
summary: Global advertising conglomerate Interpublic Group (NYSE:IPG) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales fell by 8.5% year on year to $2 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.33 per share was 27.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
